attributes.action: employ a policy of an opt out system instead of the current opt in system for organ donation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Change organ donation system from opt in to opt out system, so people are automatically are registered on the organ donor register. Around 400 people per year, die waiting for a transplant. A change in the law will give those waiting for a transplant a chance of life

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
